MemoryInfobox.name: The Child Lives
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A midwife told of a mother who died in childbirth, pierced by the arrow of Artemis to prevent any more suffering. The midwife asked that a sacrifice and offering be made.'

General_Description: '''The Child Lives''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A midwife sought the help of a [[mercenary]] to ensure proper sacrifice and offering were made.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra: I got your message on the board. What's going on?

Woman: The woman I just attended to... Artemis pierced her with her arrow to prevent her further suffering.

Kassandra: Arrow? What arrow?

Woman: It means she died in childbirth, ''misthios''. But the child lives, thank Artemis. I cannot enter the temple until a sacrifice of goats has been made and a fruit offering brought to the priestess.

''CHOICES:''

''1. You need it delivered.''

Kassandra: You want me to bring it to her.

Woman: Yes, simple enough. It needs to arrive in one piece.

''2. You want the beasts slain.''

''[dialogue]''

''CHOICES:''

''1. I'll handle it.''

Kassandra: I'll take care of it.

Woman: I'm in your debt.

Kassandra: May the Fates be on your side.

''2. Not interested''

''[dialogue]''

''When Kassandra finds the priestess and give her the offering:''

Kassandra: A midwife wanted you to have this.

Woman: Perfect timing, ''misthios''. Let me repay you.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the midwife, and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
